name: The Platform (Breadspeed1)
description:
All of the game assets got messed up when I  built the game for the second time so you will have to deal with not very good looking. 

CONTROLS

jump: space

move: wasd

pick up: left click

drop: right click

move item in hand: scroll wheel

rotate item in hand: hold middle mouse button move mouse

restart level: r

menu: tab

KNOWN BUGS:

if you press menu and resume it puts you back at level 1, mouse sensitivity in settings doesnt work except for the main menu at the beginning, idk a lot of things just dont work.
